content:
48 
 
UTME   
At least five (5) 'O' level credit passes at one  sitting   including English Language and Mathematics.  All 
programmes are of five (5) years duration.  
  
  
DIRECT ENTRY   
  
At least two (2) 'A' level passes in relevant science subjects in addition to UTME requirements. In 
addition, candidates must satisfy the departmental requirements.  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 2.2.43  FEDERAL UNIVERSITY, OTUOKE, BAYELSA STATE  
    
UTME   
  
ARTS  
Five (5) 'O’ level credit passes  including English Language, Mathematics and any two (2) of Literature in English, Religious Studie s and History or Government  
at not more than two (2) sittings.  
  
  
  
SOCIAL SCIENCES  
Five (5) 'O’ level credit passes   including English Language, Mathematics and any two (2) of Accounting, Geography, Governme nt and any other subject  at not 
more than two (2) sittings.  
  
MANAGEMENT SCIENCES (ADMINISTRATION)  
Five (5) 'O’ level credit pas ses  including English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of Accounting, Business Studies, Commerce and Economics at not  
more than two (2) sittings.
